content: this legal text summarizes a notary agreement made in 2004 regarding the division of assets in castelfidardo italy the agreement assigns two garages and portions of a courtyard to different parties specifying the value of each share it mentions the presence and consent of the parties involved as well as the ownership and proportions of the assigned real estate units the text concludes with the parties agreeing to the terms of the agreement including the guarantee of ownership and the sharing of expenses the agreement is signed by the parties and the notary
